name: Intervo AI Platform
description: Complete AI-powered conversation platform with frontend, backend, and RAG API services
compose:
services:
  mongodb:
    image: mongo:7-jammy
    environment:
      - MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=admin
      - MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=password123
    volumes:
      - mongodb_data:/data/db
    restart: unless-stopped

  frontend:
    image: node:20-alpine
    working_dir: /app
    volumes:
      - .:/app
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL_PRODUCTION=https://${domain}
    command: sh -c "npm install && cd packages/intervo-frontend && npm install && npm run build && npm start"
    depends_on:
      - backend
    restart: unless-stopped

  backend:
    image: node:20-alpine
    working_dir: /app/packages/intervo-backend
    volumes:
      - .:/app
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - MONGO_URI=mongodb://admin:password123@mongodb:27017/intervo?authSource=admin
      - SESSION_SECRET=${session_secret}
      - NEXTAUTH_SECRET=${nextauth_secret}
      - ENCRYPTION_KEY=${encryption_key}
      - OPENAI_API_KEY=${openai_api_key}
      - GROQ_API_KEY=${groq_api_key}
    command: sh -c "npm install && npm start"
    depends_on:
      - mongodb
    restart: unless-stopped

  rag-api:
    image: python:3.11-slim
    working_dir: /app/packages/intervo-backend/rag_py
    volumes:
      - .:/app
      - rag_api_cache:/root/.cache
    environment:
      - PYTHONPATH=/app/packages/intervo-backend
      - ENVIRONMENT=production
      - BACKEND_URL=http://backend:3003
    command: sh -c "pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt && python api.py"
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  mongodb_data:
  rag_api_cache:
template:
[variables]
domain = "${domain}"
session_secret = "${password:32}"
nextauth_secret = "${password:32}"
encryption_key = "${password:32}"
openai_api_key = "sk-your-openai-api-key"
groq_api_key = "gsk_your-groq-api-key"

[config]
[[config.domains]]
serviceName = "frontend"
port = 3000
host = "${domain}"

[[config.domains]]
serviceName = "backend"
port = 3003
host = "${domain}"

[[config.domains]]
serviceName = "rag-api"
port = 4003
host = "${domain}"

env = []
mounts = []
